ordered_resources.text: USE A CARD ACTION THAT HAS ALREADY BEEN USED THIS GENERATION

descriptions.description: (Action: Spend 2X MC to gain X energy, or decrease energy production 1 step to gain 8 MC.)
(Action: Spend any amount of energy to draw the same number of cards. TAKE 1 INTO HAND AND DISCARD THE REST.)
(Increase your MC production 1 step per different tag you have in play, including this.)
(Steal 3 MC from a player that REMOVED YOUR RESOURCES OR DECREASED YOUR PRODUCTION this generation. Place this card face down in THAT PLAYER'S EVENT PILE.)
(Effect: Your titanium resources are worth 1 MC extra.)
(Requires 2 Science tags.)
(Action: Gain 1 MC per Science tag you have.)
(Decrease your MC production 2 steps.)
(Requires that you have 2 Party Leaders. Gain 1 TR.)
(Effect: Your steel resources are worth 1 MC extra.)
(Action: Spend 1 floater from here to gain 1 MC for each floater here, INCLUDING THE PAID FLOATER (max 5)
(Add 1 floater here for every Earth tag you have, including this.)
(Place a city tile IN SPACE, outside and separate from the planet.)
(Effect: When you play a card with basic cost of 20MC or more, increase your MC production 1 step.)
(Action: REVEAL AND DISCARD the top card of the deck. If it has a space tag, add an asteroid here.)
(Decrease your energy production 1 step. 1VP per asteroid on this card.)

ordered_resources.text: OPPONENTS MAY NOT REMOVE YOUR PLANTS

descriptions.description: (Action: Spend 1 titanium to add 1 asteroid resource here and increase MC production 1 step.)
(1VP for each 2 asteroids on this card.)
(Action: Spend 1 titanium to add 1 asteroid resource to ANY CARD or remove 1 asteroid here to place an ocean.)
(REQUIRES THAT A PLAYER REMOVED ANOTHER PLAYER'S PLANTS THIS GENERATION. Gain 1 titanium or 2 steel.)
(Effect: When playing a card with a requirement, pay 2MC less.)
(Action: Spend 6 MC to add 1 asteroid to ANY CARD (titanium may be used to pay for this)
(Requires that you have 9 different types of resources. Gain 1 TR.)
(Increase your MC production 2 steps, increase your energy production 1 step, gain 3 plants, and place a city tile.)
(Gain 4 plants and add 4 microbes to ANOTHER CARD.)
(Raise your TR 1 step.)
(Requires 3 power tags. Raise your TR 4 steps.)
(Effect: When you gain an animal to ANY CARD, gain 2MC.)
(Action: Spend 5 heat to gain 3 steel.)
(Action: Add a microbe or animal to ANOTHER card.)
(Effect: Gain 3 plant. Raise temperature 1 step, and place 1 ocean tile.)
(Lose 2 plants. Increase your MC production 2 steps)
(Action: Draw a card.)
(Requires 2 science tags.)
(Effect: When you gain a microbe to ANY CARD, also gain 1MC.)
(Gain 3 plants.)
(Raise temperature 3 steps and gain 4 steel. Place this tile ADJACENT TO no other city tile. Remove up to 6 Plants from any player.)
(Requires 4 ocean tiles. Increase your Energy production 2 steps. Place this tile ADJECENT TO an ocean tile.)
(Decrease your Energy production 4 steps and increase your Plant production 2 steps. Raise your TR 3 steps. Place this tile.)
(Action: Spend 1 MC to add 1 asteroid to ANY card, OR spend 1 asteroid here to raise your MC production 1 step or gain 2 titanium.)
(Gain 2 asteroids to this card.)
(Draw 1 card. Choose 1 of your played cards and add 1 microbe to it for each science tag you have, including this.)
(Action: Spend 2 energy to gain 2 plants OR to add 1 animal to ANOTHER card.)
(Requires that you have 3 greenery tiles in play. Gain 12MC.)
(Requires any city adjacent to ocean.Increase your MC production 2 steps.)
(Increase titanium production 2 steps. Gain 3 titanium.)
(Requires 4% oxygen. Increase your plant production 1 step. Gain 1 plant for each plant tag you have.)
(Increase MC production 1 step.)
(Action: Spend 10 MC (titanium may be used)
(Action: Spend 3 heat to either gain 4 MC or 2 plants.)
(Requires that you have a city next to an ocean. Reveal cards from the deck until you have revealed 3 building-tag cards. Take those into hand and discard the rest.)
(RETURN 2 OF YOUR PLAYED EVENTS TO YOUR HAND. IT MAY NOT BE CARDS THAT PLACE SPECIAL TILES.)
(Effect: When you play a science tag, including this, add a graphene resource here.
Effect: When paying for a space or city tag, graphenes may be used as 4 MC each.)
(Increase steel production 1 step. Copy the production boxes of 2 of your other cards with building tags.)
(Oxygen must be 4% or less. Increase your MC production 2 steps. Gain 1 MC per empty area adjacent to your tiles.)
(Effect: When you raise temperature, gain 3 MC.)
(Increase your heat production 2 steps.)
(Increase MC production 2 steps. Draw 1 card. Remove 1 of your greenery tiles (does not affect oxygen)
(Action: Move the Nomads to an adjacent non-reserved, empty area and gain THE PLACEMENT BONUS as if placing a special tile there. No tiles may be placed on the Nomad area.)
(PLACE THE NOMADS (a gold cube)
(Effect: When any ocean is placed, you MAY pay 5 M (steel may be used)
(1 VP per hydroelectric resource on this card.)
(Effect: When paying for a building card, plants may be used as 3 MC each.)
(Requires that you have 2 greenery tiles. Increase plant production 1 step.)
(Action: Gain 1 M for each CITY AND SPECIAL TILE ADJACENT TO OCEAN, regardless of owner.)
(Requires 4% oxygen or more.)
(Effect: When you play an Earth tag, you pay 2 M less.
Effect: When any player plays a space event, you may draw a card.)
(Gain 2 titanium.)
(Action: Spend energy production to increase plant production by the same amount.)
(Raise your TR 1 step.)
(Action: Pay 5 M (steel may be used)
(silver cube)
(1 VP per cathedral in play.)
